entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or periods of ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
